content:
That's wonderful! A custom quilt is a thoughtful and personalized gift that she'll surely treasure. To complement the quilt, here are some handmade and unique gift ideas within your budget of $50:

1. **Artisanal Candle**: A handcrafted candle in a unique scent or color will add a cozy touch to her home. You can find artisanal candles at local craft fairs, Etsy, or online marketplaces. ($20-$30)
2. **Hand-painted Mug**: A one-of-a-kind, hand-painted mug will make her daily coffee or tea ritual more special. Look for independent artists or small businesses on Etsy or at local craft fairs. ($15-$25)
3. **Customized Keychain or Pendant**: A handmade keychain or pendant with her initials, name, or a special message will add a personal touch. You can find artisans on Etsy or at local craft fairs. ($10-$30)
4. **Artisanal Soap or Bath Bombs**: Handcrafted soaps or bath bombs in unique fragrances and colors will provide a luxurious pampering experience. Look for local artisans or online marketplaces. ($10-$20)
5. **Macrame Plant Hanger**: A handmade macrame plant hanger will add a bohemian touch to her home decor. You can find artisans on Etsy or at local craft fairs. ($20-$40)
6. **Handmade Journal or Notebook**: A unique, handmade journal or notebook with a special cover or paper will appeal to her love of handmade items. Look for independent bookbinders or paper artists on Etsy. ($15-$30)
7. **Customized Coasters**: A set of handmade coasters with her name, initials, or a special message will add a personal touch to her home decor. You can find artisans on Etsy or at local craft fairs. ($10-$20)

Remember, the quilt is the main gift, and these ideas are meant to complement it. Choose something that resonates with your sister's style and interests, and include a heartfelt note expressing your love and appreciation for her.
